summary: This is an email chain between an Assistant United States Attorney and a lawyer, discussing the scheduling of Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal trial. It updates the trial start date to November 29, 2021, with jury selection the week of November 15, 2021.

persons.name: Martin
persons.context: The prosecutor from the Southern District of New York who is providing updates on the scheduling of Ghislaine Maxwell's trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The accused in the criminal case US v. Ghislaine Maxwell, whose trial scheduling is the subject of the correspondence.

connections.description: Martin, as an Assistant U.S. Attorney, is a prosecutor in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Jury Selection for Maxwell Trial
events.description: Jury selection for the criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to occur during this week.

events.title: Start of Maxwell Trial
events.description: The trial for Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to begin on this date.

events.title: Trial Adjournment to Fall 2021
events.description: The court adjourned Ghislaine Maxwell's trial date to the fall of 2021.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The criminal trial for Ghislaine Maxwell (case 20 Cr. 330) was scheduled to begin on November 29, 2021.
Jury selection for the trial was set for the week of November 15, 2021.
The trial date had previously been adjourned to the fall of 2021.
The correspondence is between a federal prosecutor and a lawyer, indicating official communication about the case schedule.
The prosecutor works at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
